subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The many friends on the personal staff of Manny Pacquiao of the Philippines, one of the best boxers in the world, vie to win perks like the right to sleep at the foot of his bed.
snippet: The many friends on the personal staff of Manny Pacquiao of the Philippines, one of the best boxers in the world, vie to win perks like the right to sleep at the foot of his bed.
